fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.hardware.computers

Class ComputerDynamicState

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.data.AbstractTimeStampedData
      • fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.hardware.computers.ComputerDynamicState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.DataOfferedI.DataI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.DataRequiredI.DataI, ComputerDynamicStateI, TimeStampingI, java.io.Serializable

    public class ComputerDynamicState
extends AbstractTimeStampedData
implements ComputerDynamicStateI
    The class ComputerDynamicState implements objects representing a snapshot of the dynamic state of a computer component to be pulled or pushed through the dynamic state data interface.

    Description

    Invariant

    TODO: complete! 
     invariant              timestamp >= 0 and timestamperIP != null
 invariant              computerURI != null and reservedCores != null

    Created on : April 23, 2015

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
